sentences.en: a new play that took New York City by storm.
sentences.cn: 使整个纽约受到震撼的一出新戏

sentences.en: A storm blew up over the mountains.
sentences.cn: 山上暴风雨大作。

sentences.en: A storm has made roads treacherous and knocked out power.
sentences.cn: 一场暴风雨致使公路隐患重重且电力瘫痪。

sentences.en: A storm moved directly over the island, demolishing buildings and flooding streets.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨径直席卷该岛，摧毁了建筑，淹没了街道。

sentences.en: A tropical storm is gaining strength in the eastern Atlantic.
sentences.cn: 在大西洋东部，一场热带风暴的风力正逐渐增强。

sentences.en: An angry crowd stormed the embassy.
sentences.cn: 愤怒的人群突然袭击大使馆。

sentences.en: Forty-eight people have drowned after their boat capsized during a storm.
sentences.cn: 他们的船在暴风雨中倾覆后有48人溺亡。

sentences.en: It looked as though the storm had an awful lot of force.
sentences.cn: 看上去暴风雨来势汹汹。

sentences.en: Kenya's long distance runners have taken the athletics world by storm.
sentences.cn: 肯尼亚的长跑运动员在田径界获得了巨大成功。

sentences.en: She was born in the middle of a rain storm.
sentences.cn: 她出生在一场暴风雨中。

sentences.en: the band could really &B{play up a storm}.
sentences.cn: 那个乐团真的可以热情奔放地演出。

sentences.en: The bowlers at the eye of the storm were nowhere in evidence.
sentences.cn: 处于风口浪尖的那些投手不见了踪影。

sentences.en: The governor found himself at the center of a political storm .
sentences.cn: 州长发现自己处于一场政治风暴的中心。

sentences.en: The photos caused a storm when they were first published.
sentences.cn: 照片最初刊登出来时曾引起了一片公愤。

sentences.en: The rebel soldiers tried repeatedly to storm the building.
sentences.cn: 叛军屡次尝试强攻这座建筑。

sentences.en: The weather forecast is for severe storms tonight.
sentences.cn: 天气预报说今晚有强暴风雨。

sentences.en: The worst of the storm is yet to come.
sentences.cn: 最猛烈的暴风雨就要来了。

sentences.en: They devoted their entire airtime to covering the storm.
sentences.cn: 他们一直在全程播报这场暴风雨。

sentences.en: Tropical storm Marco is pushing northward up Florida's coast.
sentences.cn: 热带风暴“马可”正沿佛罗里达海岸向北推进。

sentences.en: Twenty people were killed when storms struck the Midwest.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨袭击中西部，造成20人死亡。

sentences.en: We'd seen the storm brewing when we were out in the boat.
sentences.cn: 我们在外面划船的时候就发现风暴将至。

phrases.phrase: the lull (或 calm) before the storm
phrases.tran_cn: 暴风雨之前的平静，预示艰难时期来临前不平常的平静期

trans.tran_en: a situation in which people suddenly express very strong feelings about something that someone has said or done
to suddenly attack and enter a place using a lot of force
